attributes.action: stricter selling time's for fire works
attributes.additional_details:
loud bangers are the butt off everyone's hate.
they are never going to be banned, so i say a stricter time limit on selling fireworks should be brought into action.

so we dont have fireworks going off weeks before and weeks after. it should be made that they can only be sold the day before and on the day of the event (bonfire night/new years eve)

at least that way our animals and also us, dont have to endure many agonising weeks of needless suffering.
